Work_experiences.job: Software Engineer / <span>Public Digital Innovation Space, The Executive Yuan<span>
Work_experiences.desciption: I served in the PDIS under the Digital Minister Tang. I am responsible for software development and live broadcast.
I learned a lot in a team that grew up, not just in technology, communication, teamwork, or even management. I developed some web projects here.

Educations.job: Master of Computer Science and Information Engineering / Fu Jen University
Educations.desciption: During the period of the Institute, in addition to academic research, in order to accumulate work experience I worked as a part-time information engineer and managed time effectively.My research is about web traffic.

Educations.job: Bachelor of Computer Science and Information Engineering / Ming Chuan University
Educations.desciption: During my college years, I worked hard to build basic skills. In order to improve my abilities, I developed the Android application of the school library. The graduation thesis was a  web-based data mining system implementation.
